tossup_question: -   –  All the elements that are more massive than iron were formed by what astronomical phenomenon?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Nova
X) White dwarf
Y) Supernova
Z) Black hole
bonus_question: -   –  In a stable atmosphere, which of the following properties of an unsaturated air parcel will increase as the parcel is forced aloft?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Relative humidity
X) Mixing ratio
Y) Saturation vapor pressure
Z) Barometric pressure
